document_data.name: Alum
document_data.mainbody: '''Alum''' was a white mineral substance that was widely used in the Realms.
document_data.Availability:
[[File:Dark Alum.png|thumb|''The rarely-seen dark alum.'']]
* Alum was a processed substance derived from certain porous rocks that were heated and dissolved in [[goldflow|urine]], producing the purified material.{{Cite dragon/152/In a Cavern, In a Canyon...|23}}
* Alum was harvested from [[Mount Hotenow]].
* Alum could be bought from [[Aurora's Emporium]] for 5 [[cp]] per {{SI|6|oz}}.
* '''Dark Alum''' was less common variety of alum that was purple in color, with a known deposit at [[Vellosk]].
* Experienced miners learned to distinguish the taste of alum in the rock, allowing them to determine its presence.

Usage.Magic: * A lump of alum was needed as a [[material component]] for casting the [[spell]] ''[[antipathy]]''.
